fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of the media

fields.name: idMal
fields.description: The mal id of the media

fields.name: title
fields.description: The official titles of the media in various languages

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of the media; anime or manga

fields.name: format
fields.description: The format the media was released in

fields.name: status
fields.description: The current releasing status of the media

fields.name: description
fields.description: Short description of the media's story and characters

fields.name: startDate
fields.description: The first official release date of the media

fields.name: endDate
fields.description: The last official release date of the media

fields.name: season
fields.description: The season the media was initially released in

fields.name: seasonYear
fields.description: The season year the media was initially released in

fields.name: seasonInt
fields.description: The year & season the media was initially released in

fields.name: episodes
fields.description: The amount of episodes the anime has when complete

fields.name: duration
fields.description: The general length of each anime episode in minutes

fields.name: chapters
fields.description: The amount of chapters the manga has when complete

fields.name: volumes
fields.description: The amount of volumes the manga has when complete

fields.name: countryOfOrigin
fields.description: Where the media was created. (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2)

fields.name: isLicensed
fields.description: If the media is officially licensed or a self-published doujin release

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source type the media was adapted from.

fields.name: hashtag
fields.description: Official Twitter hashtags for the media

fields.name: trailer
fields.description: Media trailer or advertisement

fields.name: updatedAt
fields.description: When the media's data was last updated

fields.name: coverImage
fields.description: The cover images of the media

fields.name: bannerImage
fields.description: The banner image of the media

fields.name: genres
fields.description: The genres of the media

fields.name: synonyms
fields.description: Alternative titles of the media

fields.name: averageScore
fields.description: A weighted average score of all the user's scores of the media

fields.name: meanScore
fields.description: Mean score of all the user's scores of the media

fields.name: popularity
fields.description: The number of users with the media on their list

fields.name: isLocked
fields.description: Locked media may not be added to lists our favorited. This may be due to the entry pending for deletion or other reasons.

fields.name: trending
fields.description: The amount of related activity in the past hour

fields.name: favourites
fields.description: The amount of user's who have favourited the media

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags that describes elements and themes of the media

fields.name: relations
fields.description: Other media in the same or connecting franchise

fields.name: characters
fields.description: The characters in the media

fields.name: staff
fields.description: The staff who produced the media

fields.name: studios
fields.description: The companies who produced the media

fields.name: isFavourite
fields.description: If the media is marked as favourite by the current authenticated user

fields.name: isFavouriteBlocked
fields.description: If the media is blocked from being added to favourites

fields.name: isAdult
fields.description: If the media is intended only for 18+ adult audiences

fields.name: nextAiringEpisode
fields.description: The media's next episode airing schedule

fields.name: airingSchedule
fields.description: The media's entire airing schedule

fields.name: trends
fields.description: The media's daily trend stats

fields.name: externalLinks
fields.description: External links to another site related to the media

fields.name: streamingEpisodes
fields.description: Data and links to legal streaming episodes on external sites

fields.name: rankings
fields.description: The ranking of the media in a particular time span and format compared to other media

fields.name: mediaListEntry
fields.description: The authenticated user's media list entry for the media

fields.name: reviews
fields.description: User reviews of the media

fields.name: recommendations
fields.description: User recommendations for similar media

fields.name: siteUrl
fields.description: The url for the media page on the AniList website

fields.name: autoCreateForumThread
fields.description: If the media should have forum thread automatically created for it on airing episode release

fields.name: isRecommendationBlocked
fields.description: If the media is blocked from being recommended to/from

fields.name: isReviewBlocked
fields.description: If the media is blocked from being reviewed

fields.name: modNotes
fields.description: Notes for site moderators
